trans-unit.source: Validates whether a password field meets the current password requirements for the membership provider.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute"></xref> class.
Applies formatting to an error message based on the provided name of the data field where the error occurred.
The name to include in the formatted message.
The formatted error message.
Validates the specified value with respect to the current validation attribute.
The value to validate.
The context information about the validation operation.
An instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the `MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError` attribute.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError%2A> property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message.

The error message is displayed when the provided password contains fewer non-alphanumeric characters than specified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.
The `MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError` attribute.
Gets or sets the `MinPasswordLengthError` attribute.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError%2A> property contains either a literal, non-localized string or a resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message.
The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.
The `MinPasswordLengthError` attribute.
Gets or sets the minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.

If the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.
The minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.
Gets or sets the minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.

If the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.
The minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.
Gets or sets the `PasswordStrengthError` attribute.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError%2A> property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message.
The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.
The `PasswordStrengthError` attribute.
Gets or sets a value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.
A value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.
Gets or sets the regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.

If the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property.
The regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that contains the resources for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError"></xref> property, the <xref href="System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError"></xref> property, and the <xref href="System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError"></xref> property.
